Posts.Content: Hello, My name is Kimberly C. and I was dignosed with a lump on my breast a  few months ago , but after a biopsy  nothing was detected..   The other day i went back for a Mammo and A Ultersound  only to detect it might be back.       the dr has sugeested a Breast MRI, i have no clue waht that is and thought maybe some one could help...    I have a family history of Breast cancer  so my nerve are in shock again..   Thanks, heartsaver
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer infomation

Posts.Content: Hello, My name is Kimberly  and scheduled for a biopsy on my left breast , in suspion of cancer.    my older sister was dignosed two years ago with breast cancer and i am worried that I may have it now....   To make matters worse I have a heart condtion at which I was born with and  have had 3 open heart sugeries!   I am just looking for some emotional support  or some one to talk too: who might be in the same boat...   Thank you , Kimberly C
Posts.Title: Emotional Support

Posts.Content: Hello Roseann, Wow  thank you so much for the encouraging  words  that yhou sent me !!!  Yes I can say that  I am scared top death about the possiblity of having   breast cancer , but I know thatI just have to take one day and one step at the time..... Just knowing tghat someone is  out there  that I can talk too is a great help... This website is great !!!! Have a great weekend... Keep in touch. Kimberly C.
Posts.Title: Emotional Support

Posts.Content: Cindy , Thank you so much  for the kind words on encouragement and support!!!  I will keep everyone posted about the results of  the biopsy!!! Thanks again, KImberly C.
Posts.Title: Emotional Support

Posts.Content: Great News!!! Congratuation!!  Keep up the good fight. Kimberly C
Posts.Title: good news

Posts.Content: Hello, Just to let you know  that i have not been dignosed with Breast cancer yet , but just a suspion!      My sister was dignosed with breat cancer two years ago and is doing fine. I am scheduled for as needle biopsy next monday for  what the drs think to be  a non cancer lump!!    So I will just have to wait  and see.. I am hopping for the best.   Breast cancer runs in my family , so that what makes me a little more nervous...   Please keep me in your thoughts and prayers as a travel this journey... Thank you again, Kimberly C.
Posts.Title: Emotional Support

Posts.Content: Great News!!!  My name is Kimberly C, and yesterday I went to have a biospy on my left breast  in suspition of cancer.    Great News , after futher  views of an ultersound on my left breast , they could not find the lump!!!!! Why am I being spaied?   my older sister has brest cancer and contiues to fight the battle. I have been so worred and stessed out about  the fact that I may or may not have cancer, that I  just cried!!! The dr are contnue  to watch the  the sist  that I have on my right breast and I am   going to have another MAMOgram in one moth to make sure that  the lump on my left  breast  does not appear. I will all of you the best of luck as you continue to  travel on your life jouney.   Thank yoyu again, Kimberly C
Posts.Title: emotional support

Posts.Content: Hello, My name is Kimberly C. and I am going to have a breast biospy on monday and I scared to  death that I may have breast cancer ! My sister was dignosed  with breast cancer two years ago and so you can see that this runs highly in my family. When I first read this message I though that this is  me, to back up that sataement when the dr first found  that I had a lump on my breast ; i di not say anyhtining to my family  until I went to have a mamagram and a ultersound, boy was that hard to do !!!    My family know that there was somnething not right  with me  and then finally I just broke down  crying  and final said I  may have breast cancer! well to summerize all of that ,   i  am trying to be stong but really in side I feel like I am going to explode!! Never keep it inside always know that someone is ready to listen to you!!! Kimberly C.
Posts.Title: emotional support

Posts.Content: Hitracey, My name Is  kimberly C. and I am 37 years old  last year i went thought the same thing that you are going  through now!!  I went to the dr for what I thought was a routine exam  the dr found a a mass and scheduled a Mammo and a ultersound and then I went to see a surgeon and he ordered a biopsy.. I wqs so scared  my whole body was just numb, The first thing I did was reach out  for help ! and thatwas ythe  greastest thing that I did !!! yes like you I havce a family history of Breast Cancer.. The people that I talked to helped me though my fears worries and  just having someone that knew what I may be going through. Weel My biopsy reveled a non migligment area  so the drs decided  to just watch it and wait!!! here I am a year later and I  just went for a mammo and A ultersound  the other day  and now I am scheduled for a Breast MRI... If you ever need to talk I am hear to listen.. Good luck , my thought and prayers are with you.. Keep me posted.. Heartsaver
Posts.Title: 43 and Just found Lump on Tuesday
